N biomarkers (2018 scheme)

Source: R/N.R
N2018.Rd

Computes the overall N-status by OR-combining any subset of these biomarkers:

  • nfl

  • mri_atrophy

  • fdg_pet At least one non-empty biomarker must be supplied. Zero-length inputs are ignored.

Usage

N2018(nfl, mri_atrophy, fdg_pet)

Arguments

nfl

bmk vector for Neurofilament light chain (optional)

mri_atrophy

bmk vector for MRI-derived atrophy (optional)

fdg_pet

bmk vector for FDG PET (optional)

Value

A bmk vector representing the combined N-status.

On this page

Developed by Ramiro Magno, Miguel Casanova, Pattern Institute.
